verses.verse: And He <S%G1831>went<s%> out from <S%G1564>there,<s%> and He <S%G2064>came<s%> into His <S%G3968>home<s%> <S%G3968>town;<s%> and His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> Him.

And when the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> had <S%G1096>come,<s%> He <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogue;<s%> and the <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G191>listeners<s%> were <S%G1605>astonished,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4159>"Where<s%> did <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> [get] <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> and <S%G5101>what<s%> is [this] <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> to Him, and <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G1411>miracles<s%> as <S%G5108>these<s%> <S%G1096>performed<s%> by His <S%G5495>hands<s%>?

"Is not <S%G3778>this<s%> the <S%G5045>carpenter,<s%> the <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> and <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G2385>James,<s%> and <S%G2500>Joses,<s%> and <S%G2455>Judas,<s%> and <S%G4613>Simon<s%>? Are not His <S%G79>sisters<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> with us?" And they <S%G4624>took<s%> <S%G4624>offense<s%> at Him.

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "A <S%G4396>prophet<s%> is not <S%G820>without<s%> <S%G820>honor<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> in his <S%G3968>home<s%> <S%G3968>town<s%> and <S%G1722>among<s%> his [own] <S%G4773>relatives<s%> and in his [own] <S%G3614>household.<s%>"

And He <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G1411>miracle<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> that He <S%G2007>laid<s%> His <S%G5495>hands<s%> upon a <S%G3641>few<s%> <S%G732>sick<s%> <S%G732>people<s%> and <S%G2323>healed<s%> them.
And He <S%G2296>wondered<s%> at their <S%G570>unbelief.<s%> And He was <S%G4013>going<s%> <S%G4013>around<s%> <S%G2945><s%> the <S%G2968>villages<s%> <S%G1321>teaching.<s%>

And He <S%G4341>summoned<s%> the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> and <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G649>send<s%> them out in <S%G1417>pairs;<s%> and He was <S%G1325>giving<s%> them <S%G1849>authority<s%> over the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits;<s%>

and He <S%G3853>instructed<s%> them that they should <S%G142>take<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> for [their] <S%G3598>journey,<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> a <S%G3441>mere<s%> <S%G4464>staff;<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4082>bag,<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5475>money<s%> in their <S%G2223>belt;<s%>
but [to] <S%G5265>wear<s%> <S%G4547>sandals;<s%> and [He added], "Do not <S%G1746>put<s%> on <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5509>tunics.<s%>"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G3699>"Wherever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> you <S%G1525>enter<s%> a <S%G3614>house,<s%> <S%G3306>stay<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> you <S%G1831>leave<s%> <S%G1564>town.<s%>

"And <S%G3739>any<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> that does not <S%G1209>receive<s%> you <S%G3366>or<s%> <S%G191>listen<s%> to you, as you <S%G1607>go<s%> out from <S%G1564>there,<s%> <S%G1621>shake<s%> <S%G1621>off<s%> the <S%G5529>dust<s%> from the <S%G5270>soles<s%> of your <S%G4228>feet<s%> for a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> against them."
And they <S%G1831>went<s%> out and <S%G2784>preached<s%> that [men] should <S%G3340>repent.<s%>

And they were <S%G1544>casting<s%> out <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1140>demons<s%> and were <S%G218>anointing<s%> with <S%G1637>oil<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G732>sick<s%> <S%G732>people<s%> and <S%G2323>healing<s%> them.

And <S%G935>King<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> [of it,] for His <S%G3686>name<s%> had <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5318>well<s%> <S%G5318>known;<s%> and [people] were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2491>"John<s%> the <S%G907>Baptist<s%> has <S%G1453>risen<s%> from the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and that is <S%G1223>why<s%> <S%G3588>these<s%> <S%G1411>miraculous<s%> <S%G1411>powers<s%> are at <S%G1754>work<s%> in Him."

But <S%G243>others<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "He is <S%G2243>Elijah.<s%>" And <S%G243>others<s%> were <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "[He is] a <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets<s%> [of old."]
But when <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> [of it,] he kept <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2491>"John,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> I <S%G607>beheaded,<s%> has <S%G1453>risen!<s%>"

For <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> had <S%G649>sent<s%> and had <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2902>arrested<s%> and <S%G1210>bound<s%> in <S%G5438>prison<s%> on <S%G1223>account<s%> of <S%G2266>Herodias,<s%> the <S%G1135>wife<s%> of his <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5376>Philip,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he had <S%G1060>married<s%> her.
For <S%G2491>John<s%> had been <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> "It is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> for you to <S%G2192>have<s%> your brother's <S%G1135>wife.<s%>"
And <S%G2266>Herodias<s%> <S%G1758>had<s%> a <S%G1758>grudge<s%> <S%G1758>against<s%> him and <S%G2309>wanted<s%> to <S%G615>put<s%> him to <S%G615>death<s%> and <S%G1410>could<s%> not [do so;]

for <S%G2264>Herod<s%> was <S%G5399>afraid<s%> of <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G3609>knowing<s%> that he was a <S%G1342>righteous<s%> and <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> and <S%G4933>kept<s%> him <S%G4933>safe.<s%> And when he <S%G191>heard<s%> him, he was <S%G4183>very<s%> <S%G639>perplexed;<s%> but he used to <S%G2234>enjoy<s%> <S%G191>listening<s%> to him.

And a <S%G2121>strategic<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> on his <S%G1077>birthday<s%> <S%G4160>gave<s%> a <S%G1173>banquet<s%> for his <S%G3175>lords<s%> and <S%G5506>military<s%> <S%G5506>commanders<s%> and the <S%G4413>leading<s%> <S%G4413>men<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee;<s%>

and when the <S%G2364>daughter<s%> of <S%G2266>Herodias<s%> <S%G846>herself<s%> <S%G1525>came<s%> in and <S%G3738>danced,<s%> she <S%G700>pleased<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> and his <S%G4873>dinner<s%> <S%G4873>guests;<s%> and the <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G2877>girl,<s%> <S%G154>"Ask<s%> me for <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> you <S%G2309>want<s%> and I will <S%G1325>give<s%> it to you."
And he <S%G3660>swore<s%> to her, <S%G3739>"Whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> you <S%G154>ask<s%> of me, I will <S%G1325>give<s%> it to you; up to <S%G2255>half<s%> of my <S%G932>kingdom.<s%>"

And she <S%G1831>went<s%> out and <S%G3004>said<s%> to her <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> shall I <S%G154>ask<s%> for?" And she <S%G3004>said,<s%> "The <S%G2776>head<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G907>Baptist.<s%>"

And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> she <S%G1525>came<s%> in <S%G4710>haste<s%> <S%G4314>before<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> and <S%G154>asked,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "I <S%G2309>want<s%> you to <S%G1325>give<s%> me <S%G1824>right<s%> <S%G1824>away<s%> the <S%G2776>head<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist<s%> on a <S%G4094>platter.<s%>"

And although the <S%G935>king<s%> was <S%G4036>very<s%> <S%G4036>sorry,<s%> [yet] <S%G1223>because<s%> of his <S%G3727>oaths<s%> and because of his <S%G345>dinner<s%> <S%G345>guests,<s%> he was <S%G3756>unwilling<s%> <S%G2309><s%> to <S%G114>refuse<s%> her.

And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> the <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> an <S%G4688>executioner<s%> and <S%G2004>commanded<s%> [him] to <S%G5342>bring<s%> [back] his <S%G2776>head.<s%> And he <S%G565>went<s%> and had him <S%G607>beheaded<s%> in the <S%G5438>prison,<s%>
and <S%G5342>brought<s%> his <S%G2776>head<s%> on a <S%G4094>platter,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> it to the <S%G2877>girl;<s%> and the <S%G2877>girl<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> it to her <S%G3384>mother.<s%>
And when his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> [about this,] they <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G142>took<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> his <S%G4430>body<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> it in a <S%G3419>tomb.<s%>

And the <S%G652>apostles<s%> <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> with <S%G2424>Jesus;<s%> and they <S%G518>reported<s%> to Him <S%G3956>all<s%> that they had <S%G4160>done<s%> and <S%G1321>taught.<s%>

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1205>"Come<s%> <S%G1205>away<s%> by <S%G4771>yourselves<s%> <S%G846><s%> to a <S%G2048>lonely<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> and <S%G373>rest<s%> a <S%G3641>while.<s%>" (For there were <S%G4183>many<s%> [people] <S%G2064>coming<s%> and <S%G5217>going,<s%> and they did not <S%G3761>even<s%> <S%G2119>have<s%> <S%G2119>time<s%> to <S%G2068>eat.<s%>)
And they <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G565>away<s%> in the <S%G4143>boat<s%> to a <S%G2048>lonely<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> by <S%G2398>themselves.<s%>

And [the people] <S%G3708>saw<s%> them <S%G5217>going,<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1921>recognized<s%> [them,] and they <S%G4936>ran<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G4936>together<s%> on <S%G3979>foot<s%> from <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4172>cities,<s%> and <S%G4281>got<s%> <S%G4281>there<s%> <S%G4281>ahead<s%> of them.

And when He <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>ashore,<s%> He <S%G3708>saw<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> and He <S%G4697>felt<s%> <S%G4697>compassion<s%> for them <S%G3754>because<s%> they were <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G3361>without<s%> <S%G2192><s%> a <S%G4166>shepherd;<s%> and He <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> them <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4183>things.<s%>

And when it was <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G4183>quite<s%> <S%G5610>late,<s%> <S%G4183><s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> up to Him and [began] <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "The <S%G5117>place<s%> is <S%G2048>desolate<s%> and it is <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G4183>quite<s%> <S%G5610>late<s%><S%G4183>;<s%>

<S%G630>send<s%> them <S%G630>away<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that they may <S%G565>go<s%> into the <S%G2945>surrounding<s%> <S%G68>countryside<s%> and <S%G2968>villages<s%> and <S%G59>buy<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G5101>something<s%> to <S%G2068>eat.<s%> "

But He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "You <S%G1325>give<s%> them [something] to <S%G2068>eat!<s%>" And they <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "Shall we <S%G565>go<s%> and <S%G59>spend<s%> <S%G1250>two<s%> <S%G1250>hundred<s%> <S%G1220>denarii<s%> on <S%G740>bread<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> them [something] to <S%G2068>eat<s%>? "

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4214>"How<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> do you <S%G2192>have<s%>? <S%G5217>Go<s%> <S%G3708>look!<s%>" And when they <S%G1097>found<s%> out, they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G4002>"Five<s%> and <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fish.<s%>"
And He <S%G2004>commanded<s%> them <S%G3956>all<s%> to <S%G347>recline<s%> by <S%G4849>groups<s%> on the <S%G5515>green<s%> <S%G5528>grass.<s%>
And they <S%G377>reclined<s%> in <S%G4237>companies<s%> of <S%G1540>hundreds<s%> and of <S%G4004>fifties.<s%>

And He <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> and the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fish,<s%> and <S%G308>looking<s%> up <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> He <S%G2127>blessed<s%> [the food] and <S%G2622>broke<s%> the <S%G740>loaves<s%> and He kept <S%G1325>giving<s%> [them] to the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G3908>set<s%> <S%G3908>before<s%> them; and He <S%G3307>divided<s%> up the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2486>fish<s%> among them <S%G3956>all.<s%>
And they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2068>ate<s%> and were <S%G5526>satisfied.<s%>
And they <S%G142>picked<s%> up <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G4138>full<s%> <S%G2894>baskets<s%> of the <S%G2801>broken<s%> <S%G2801>pieces,<s%> and also of the <S%G2486>fish.<s%>
And there were <S%G4000>five<s%> <S%G4000>thousand<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> who <S%G2068>ate<s%> the <S%G740>loaves.<s%>

And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> He <S%G315>made<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1684>get<s%> into the <S%G4143>boat<s%> and <S%G4254>go<s%> <S%G4254>ahead<s%> of [Him] to the <S%G4008>other<s%> <S%G4008>side<s%> to <S%G966>Bethsaida,<s%> <S%G2193>while<s%> He <S%G846>Himself<s%> was <S%G630>sending<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G630>away.<s%>
And after <S%G657>bidding<s%> them <S%G657>farewell,<s%> He <S%G565>departed<s%> to the <S%G3735>mountain<s%> to <S%G4336>pray.<s%>
And when it was <S%G3798>evening,<s%> the <S%G4143>boat<s%> was in the <S%G3319>midst<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> and He [was] <S%G3441>alone<s%> on the <S%G1093>land.<s%>

And <S%G3708>seeing<s%> them <S%G928>straining<s%> at the <S%G1643>oars,<s%> for the <S%G417>wind<s%> was <S%G1727>against<s%> them, at <S%G4012>about<s%> the <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G5438>watch<s%> of the <S%G3571>night,<s%> He <S%G2064>came<s%> to them, <S%G4043>walking<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea;<s%> and He <S%G2309>intended<s%> to <S%G3928>pass<s%> by them.
But when they <S%G3708>saw<s%> Him <S%G4043>walking<s%> on the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> they <S%G1380>supposed<s%> that it was a <S%G5326>ghost,<s%> and <S%G349>cried<s%> out;

for they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> Him and were <S%G5015>frightened.<s%> But <S%G2117>immediately<s%> He <S%G2980>spoke<s%> with them and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G2293>"Take<s%> <S%G2293>courage;<s%> it is I, do not be <S%G5399>afraid.<s%>"
And He <S%G305>got<s%> into the <S%G4143>boat<s%> with them, and the <S%G417>wind<s%> <S%G2869>stopped;<s%> and they were <S%G3029>greatly<s%> <S%G1537><s%> <S%G4053><s%> <S%G1839>astonished,<s%>
for they had not <S%G4920>gained<s%> any <S%G4920>insight<s%> from the [incident of] the <S%G740>loaves,<s%> but their <S%G2588>heart<s%> was <S%G4456>hardened.<s%>
And when they had <S%G1276>crossed<s%> <S%G1276>over<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G1093>land<s%> at <S%G1082>Gennesaret,<s%> and <S%G4358>moored<s%> to the shore.
And when they had <S%G1831>come<s%> out of the <S%G4143>boat,<s%> <S%G2117>immediately<s%> [the people] <S%G1921>recognized<s%> Him,

and <S%G4063>ran<s%> <S%G4063>about<s%> that <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G5561>country<s%> and <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G4064>carry<s%> <S%G4064>about<s%> on their <S%G2895>pallets<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G2560>sick,<s%> to the <S%G3699>place<s%> they <S%G191>heard<s%> He was.

And <S%G3699>wherever<s%> <S%G302><s%> He <S%G1531>entered<s%> <S%G2968>villages,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4172>cities,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G68>countryside,<s%> they were <S%G5087>laying<s%> the <S%G770>sick<s%> in the <S%G58>market<s%> <S%G58>places,<s%> and <S%G3870>entreating<s%> Him that they might <S%G2579>just<s%> <S%G681>touch<s%> the <S%G2899>fringe<s%> of His <S%G2440>cloak;<s%> and as <S%G3745>many<s%> as <S%G681>touched<s%> it were being <S%G4982>cured.<s%>
